page.title: 19TRADE:WOODTON AREA
page.content: This block includes much open country- side & relatively few houses so it is not surprising to find that apart from farming & a stud farm,breeding Welsh ponies,there are few other businesses. The Woodton garage on the main Norwich -Bungay road has the agency for Peugeot & Talbot cars for this part of Norfolk & nearby Suffolk;it also sells petrol & diesel fuels.Apart from the 4 members of the family,it employs 3 other people,who together provide sales,servicing & repairs for these 2 makes of car. The nursery in Woodton is another family business.It has about 7000 sq.yards of greenhouses producing lettuce in the winter & about 7000lbs tomatoes per week as well as cucumbers in the summer.All this is managed by the 2 owners & a part-time lady.
